Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Padiamunnebnesuttawy with painted detail: a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a black beard, large joined hands in relief holding a black hoe and the string of the black seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder, the front of the lower-section is inscribed with black painted hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
